titles: The origine of atheism in the popish and Protestant churches shew'n by Dorotheus Sicurus, 1648 ; made into English, and a preface added by E.B., Esquire.
Origo atheismi in pontificia et evangelica ecclesia. English
author: Crenius, Thomas, 1648-1728.
E. B., Esquire.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
On caption title page: "Translated out of Latin."
